Uses of Class
org.netbeans.api.editor.caret.CaretInfo

  • Packages that use CaretInfo 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.api.editor.caret
    The Editor Caret API opens up the editor to give information about its carets and to manipulate them.
    org.netbeans.spi.editor.caret
    The Editor Caret SPI contains interface(s) to be implemented by clients in order to manipulate the editor carets.

    • Uses of CaretInfo in org.netbeans.api.editor.caret

      Methods in org.netbeans.api.editor.caret that return CaretInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CaretInfo EditorCaret.getCaretAt(int offset)
      Get information about the caret at the specified offset.
      CaretInfo EditorCaret.getLastCaret()
      Get info about the most recently created caret.
      CaretInfo CaretMoveContext.getOriginalLastCaret()
      Get last item from the list returned by CaretMoveContext.getOriginalCarets().
      Methods in org.netbeans.api.editor.caret that return types with arguments of type CaretInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<CaretInfo> EditorCaret.getCarets()
      Get information about all existing carets in the order they were created.
      List<CaretInfo> CaretMoveContext.getOriginalCarets()
      Get list of carets at the time when transaction started.
      List<CaretInfo> CaretMoveContext.getOriginalSortedCarets()
      Get list of carets at the time when transaction started sorted by dot positions in ascending order.
      List<CaretInfo> EditorCaret.getSortedCarets()
      Get information about all existing carets sorted by dot positions in ascending order.
      Methods in org.netbeans.api.editor.caret with parameters of type CaretInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean CaretMoveContext.moveDot(CaretInfo caret, Position dotPos, Position.Bias dotBias)
      Move dot of the given caret so caret selection gets created or changed.
      boolean CaretMoveContext.setDot(CaretInfo caret, Position dotPos, Position.Bias dotBias)
      Change dot of the given caret.
      boolean CaretMoveContext.setDotAndMark(CaretInfo caret, Position dotPos, Position.Bias dotBias, Position markPos, Position.Bias markBias)
      Move dot of the given caret so caret selection gets created or changed.
      boolean CaretMoveContext.setMagicCaretPosition(CaretInfo caret, Point p)
      Set magic caret position of the given caret.

    • Uses of CaretInfo in org.netbeans.spi.editor.caret

      Methods in org.netbeans.spi.editor.caret that return CaretInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract CaretInfo NavigationFilterBypass.getCaretItem()
      Returns the currently changing CaretItem.
